_sText:
// fixed //

- soundscape
- low fps (good performance now, more them 200% fps)
- modification of some spots in the map,
  for better playing experience
- removed the sewer
- more indication for Terrorist
- some texture fixed, not the all of them... and i am not a painter...

// bugs //

- 4 shadows are cut, but don't affect any game play and is barely noticeable when playing.
- 2 textures are not aligned, but the same of the shadows, don't affect any thing.
- i thing one of the spawns are not working... but the map have more them 64slots, if i am not in error...
  so it should be a problem at all. [77.3 ; 6.0 ; 6.0]T Spawn

// FEATURES //

- 64 spawn (don't know if one spawn works)
- radar with overview (except some buildings)
- only 2 rotating door's and a few breakable windows
- 2 bombsites (A and B)
- 1 spots with water
- .nav file
- 3d skybox
- soundscape

// in the .rar //

- info:

log of the compilation.
- map:


file name: de_cittadella_v2
file size: [uncompressed] ~15 MB
date released: 05-03-2010

PLZ FEEDBACK IT, and rate it =D THX

the map is medium-, its is good for a server for 40slots or less, more i don't advice...
